colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(SHES DAM CAN GSHIN RJE RGYAL PO'I GTANG RAG 'BUL TSUL 'DI NI BYANG PHYOGS 'GRO BA'I MGON PO THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA RJE BTZUN DAM PA'I DNGOS SLOB, ,GZHUNG LCAGS 'BUM PHRAG SMRA BA'I RAB 'BYAMS PA AER TE NI CHOS RJE BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN RGYAL MTSAN GYIS 'DI RIGS PHYOGS 'DIR MTSAN NYID DANG LDAN PA MI SNANG BAS, ,KHYED KYIS RTZOMS SHIG PAR DNGUL SRANG GNYIS KYI MAntI KHA GTAGS NYIN BDE MA DANG BCAS GSUNG GIS BSKUL BA LA BRTEN @002B NAS RGYAL KHAMS PA NGAG DBANG DKON MCHOG NYI MAS RVA LUGS KYI YIG CHA DANG, BLA MA'I MAN NGAG BZHIN DU, 'JAM DBYANGS GONG MA'I RGYAL KHAB CHEN POR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI GNAS LNGA RIG PA'I PAndI TA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN NO,, ,,)
